gen:link.msg:message: BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults SHOULD only be reported for the current reporting period. | {for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgAdimOnlyReportFactCurrent1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

EquityAndLiabilities SHOULD be equal to + Assets. | {for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateOneVariable1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateOneVariable1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

When the reported value of BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults is equal to Na then ResultForTheYear SHOULD NOT be reported. | {for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgPrecondValueConceptAndNoExistenceConcept1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgPrecondValueConceptAndNoExistenceConcept1_ResultForTheYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

{$Assets/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

{$AssetsCurrent/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

{$AssetsNoncurrent/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

{$Equity/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $Equity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

{$EquityAndLiabilities/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
